## Chess.loadPgn() method

Load the moves of a game stored in Portable Game Notation (PGN).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
loadPgn(pgn: string, options?: {
        newline_char?: string;
        sloppy?: boolean;
    }): boolean;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  pgn | string |  |
|  options | { newline\_char?: string; sloppy?: boolean; } | Load options |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
